wfsSumQuery.description: Select feature of a WFS service for evaluation by geometry.
wfsSumQuery.destinationLayer: Select a WFS layer for evaluation:
wfsSumQuery.layerSwitchOffWarning: Turning off the layer: {{layerName}} through the theme tree is currently not possible as it is selected in the tool {{toolName}}.
wfsSumQuery.layerSwitchOnInfo: You have turned on the layer: {{layerName}} in the theme tree. In the tool {{toolName}}, this will not be evaluated because the layer: {{selectedLayerName}} is selected there.
wfsSumQuery.name: WFS-SumQuery
wfsSumQuery.noAttributesFound: No attributes were found for layer {{layerName}}. Please check your layer configuration.
wfsSumQuery.noFeatureFound: No features were found within the drawn geometry for the layer {{layerName}}.
wfsSumQuery.sumInfo: Select one or more of the available attributes. Numerical values are summed in the table.
